channel.title: [Feedback/Suggestion] Fool's class description mentions 'Surpise Mojo' but skill no longer in game
channel.description:
#### Player went to review the skills for Fool to obtain a better understanding of Fool's dynamics after patch update.
#### Player should not be presented with conflicting pieces of information.
#### Steps to reproduce: 1. Player navigates to the 'Classes' screen 2. Player selects 'Fool' class
#### Comments:
Fool's description text mentions Surprise Mojo but the Fool no longer has this skill after patch v1.0.8c
Screenshot: https://imgur.com/a/K69Iu
